Skip HP Software Setup

HP recommends that you use the HP software to connect to the network and finish setting up the printer. Doing so gets you printing quickly—from all of your devices and access to all HP solutions. To continue setting up your printer without HP software, touch “Skip".

 
Firmware Update

Firmware updates can improve, enhance, or extend your printer’s functionality and features, protect against security threats, and serve other purposes. HP recommends enabling automatic firmware updates.

Please note that this printer uses dynamic security measures to block cartridges using a non-HP chip, and periodic firmware updates will maintain the effectiveness of these measures and block cartridges that previously worked. The printer is intended to work only with new or reused cartridges that have a new or reused HP chip. For more information, go to www.hp.com/learn/ds

Your choices are:

  • Auto Update (Recommended) - Automatically check for and install new updates.
  • Notify - Automatically check for new updates and notify. You can choose if you want to install.

Select “Next” to make your selection.

 
Firmware Update
  • Home
  • Auto Update (Recommended)
  • Notify
